metadata.name: Kids Of War-BURNING HOME #01
metadata.description:
We are making the world's first NFT of drawings done by Ukrainian children whose lives were forever changed by Russia’s war.
All proceeds from mint and 100% royalty will go to Ukrainian charities that are helping little Ukrainians during the war and even now. 
So also we decided to use these as a symbol to show to the world Russia’s brutal war against Ukraine through the eyes of Ukrainian children, millions of whom have been displaced, and hundreds killed and injured.
